ygData.subject: Re: Split personality
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The ground in front of her explodes. She falls to the ground and shakes her head.  She stood up and her body trembled as the maximal program took over.

::Spears::

The ground in front of her explodes. She falls to the ground and 
shakes her head.  She stood up and her body trembled as the maximal 
program took over.  She looked at Firearm and Lunarpine.  She had the 
look of utter confusion on her face. She saw that Firearm was in tank 
mode and aiming at her.  She yelled out, "Please, don't shoot. Why 
are you aiming at me like that? Why are you trying to shoot me 
Firearm? I didn't do anything?"  She stood there, scared and 
confused.  She looked around and then back at Firearm, "Please don't 
shoot. I didn't do anything. I'm a maximal, your friend....why?"

The programs went wild, fighting for control.  Her body shook as the 
trainer program was about to take over again.  She stood there, her 
eyes looking into nothingness as the programs started to change 
places again.

She then faced Firearm as the trainer program took over. "Go ahead 
and shoot Maximal. You don't have the guts to kill. None of you 
maximals do."  She turned and ran again.  She opened her link 
again,"MASTER PREBON! I NEED HELP, NOW!"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm swears, not even bothering to dodge as optic shots nearly 
hit him. He 
> growls, speeding up as he hears her scream into her comm. Prebon 
was going to 
> pay for this...
> 
> Transforming into tank mode, Firearm slams down to the ground, his 
back 
> thrusters speeding him at Spears, rapidly gaining on her as his 
missile 
> launcher fires a missile, aiming at an area ten feet in front of 
her.
